General.Name: Erbud SA
General.Description: Erbud S.A., together with its subsidiaries, engages in the construction business in Poland and internationally. It undertakes shopping centers, office buildings, residential buildings, public utility facilities, hotels, schools, and other construction works. The company engages in construction of renewable energy, including solar and wind farm; and SPA facilities, power plants, production rooms, and highways., as well as offers engineering and maintenance services. The company was founded in 1990 and is based in Warsaw, Poland.

6.Name: Mr. Bogdan  Durr
6.Title: Pres of the Board ERBUD International Sp. z o.o.
